item.title: DConf Editor Gnome
item.description: What is it? # Dconf Editor is a graphical tool used to configure settings in Linux, particularly on GNOME desktop environments. It allows users to navigate and modify system options stored in the dconf database, which is a key-value store that manages different aspects of the system.
